downloadTitle: Back up and restore planning worksheet
downloadDescription: This worksheet helps you record installed databases and content in a SharePoint environment.
detailsSection: This worksheet helps you plan to back up and restore a SharePoint environment. Record services, content databases, and web applications that you use on farms so that you can make sure to restore appropriate components.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
